meanings.definition: A highlighted word or phrase in an electronic document that, when clicked, takes the user to another location within the same document or to a different document.
meanings.sent1: I clicked on the hyperlinks to find more information.
meanings.sent2: The article had several hyperlinks to related topics.
meanings.sent3: The hyperlinks in the text were like secret doors to new knowledge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a web of hyperlinks connecting various ideas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of using hyperlinks for easy navigation.

meanings.definition: To create a hyperlink in a document.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to hyperlink text in her presentation.
meanings.sent2: Remember to hyperlink the sources in your research paper.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could hyperlink his coffee to make it refill automatically.
meanings.sent4: The artist hyperlinks colors to evoke different emotions in her paintings.
meanings.sent5: The web designer will hyperlink the homepage to other sections for seamless browsing.
